description:
SRAM rethought the standard chain, creating a flattop linkage that runs incredibly smoothly. A narrow profile lets this flattop chain glide easily up and down 12-speed cassettes and provides much quieter operation.

  • Flattop design allows the chain to be narrower, making wider gear ranges possible
  • Quieter than standard chains
  • Compatible with SRAM 12-speed 1x and 2x eTap AXS road groupsets
  • Solid pin construction is strong and durable
  • Flattop Powerlock chain connector for better chain guiding and longevity
  • Nickel silver and inner outer plates
name: SRAM Rival D1 Flattop 12-Speed Chain
